overview: Six super-stacked naturals are sent to the Busty Riding Academy hoping to learn how to ride, but they end up riding more than horses. They ride cocks! Christy Marks and Terry Nova have a four-way in the barn, Jasmine Black gets DP'd in the boudoir, Kristy Klenot and Melissa Mandlikova have a tits-and-tugs three-way and sensation Karina Hart rides off into the sunset after taking a sticky load between her H-cup tits. Filmed on-location in Budapest, Hungary!
tagline: They Learned To Ride... And To Be Ridden.
title: Busty Riding Academy
